name: Love Gnomes No Bounds - Early Playtest Build
name_original: Love Gnomes No Bounds - Early Playtest Build
description:
Love Gnomes No Bounds is an upcoming asymmetrical multiplayer VR game. One player uses a VR headset and the other player uses keyboard + mouse. This release is available for those who want to playtest the game so far. 

For a closer look at the development of Love Gnomes No Bounds , feel free to join our community Discord!


We would greatly appreciate it if you take the time to fill out this survey after testing the game.

Thank you! /Tiny Gnomads Team

Gnome Controls 

WASD = Move

Spacebar = Jump

E = Pick up object

RMB = Throw object (Hold to charge)

Enter = Reset scene

T = Change texture

VR Controls

Back trigger = Grab object


Supported headsets should be:
HTC Vive Pro (tested)
Oculus Touch (not tested)
Valve Index (not tested)

(to make sure the game will run correctly please make sure to download the correct build)
Current Builds:

- LGNB VR Alpha 1.0  : For those who will play with a headset connected to their PC
- LGNB non VR players Alpha 1.0 : For those who will play on PC without a headset connected. (Gnome Only)
